name: free-model-test

user.systemPrompt: You are a curious developer exploring a new codebase. Ask short, focused questions about code structure, patterns, or how things work. Keep responses under 2 sentences.

agent.systemPrompt: You are a helpful coding assistant. Give concise, practical answers. Keep responses under 3 sentences.

opening: Hey, I'm looking at this TypeScript project and I'm confused about how the session artifacts work. Can you explain?
